name: Student Textbook Exchange
short_description:
This project is a website for students to buy and sell textbooks with each other. 
The website is targeted at students from Pacific Lutheran University. This site
is what I am developing for my senior project and it is currently a work in progress.
I will continue to update it as I move further along in the project. 

This site will allow users to upload used textbooks to sell and allow them to buy
books from other students. The website will also provide a feature for students
to search an outside source for a specific book if the one they desire is not 
available. This will be accomplished using Google's Custom Search API. 

All of the associated source code is available for download. My website uses 
Smarty web templates to make the development more efficient. I currently do 
not have a place to host my website since this is only for the sake of my class
project.
summary: This is a website for students to buy and sell textbooks
